ohu wisin sapekshathawadayehi samanya siddhantha asurin, bhramanaya wana anshuwakata prathiwiruddhawa prakshepanaya karana lada anshuwak, awasanayedi bhramanaya wana anshuwata samanawa bhramanaya wana bawata ganithamaya washayen anawaki pala kaleya.meya pasu kalinawa brithanya-amarikanu gaweshana kandayamak wisin 1980 di soyaganu labiya.

ithin mama wadi hariyak awadhanaya yomu karanne aartha wenas wima walata.

eka paththakin, widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya digatama pawathwa gatha yuthu bawata janadhipathiwarayage shri lanka nidahas pakshaya nila niwedana nikuth karana athare, hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapakshage anugamikayan wana saha ohuge deshapalanika nyaya pathraya matha katayuthu karana gihi jathiwadin saha pawidi jathiwadin pasugiya masa kihipaya purama thawath karanayak rata pura gena giyeya.

20.gas naginne waduro kiyala wihiluwata kiwwata gas nagina eka hoda wyayamayak.waththe pitiye gas thiyenawa nam kakul deka uda thiyan bakan nilan inne nathiwa gas naginna.paya bagayak withara mehema kaloth dawasakata kalari 275k withara dahanaya wenawa.
